Title: BITM Recruitment 2024
Summary:
- BITM Recruitment 2024 : The Birla Industrial and Technological Museum (BITM), Kolkata, under the Ministry of Culture, has announced an exciting opportunity for eligible candidates
- Here’s everything you need to know about BITM Recruitment 2024, including eligibility, vacancy details, and the application process
- WhatsApp JOIN NOW Telegram JOIN NOW

Title: THSTI Recruitment 2024
Summary:
- THSTI Recruitment 2024:  The BRIC-Translational Health Science and Technology Institute (THSTI) is recruiting for 01 Post of Research Officer (Clinical) under the Ministry of Science and Technology
- This role is part of a project aimed at tackling sepsis-related mortality among newborns in India
- Candidates with qualifications such as First-class Master in Life Sciences, MBBS, BDS, or equivalent, with at least 1 year of relevant clinical research experience are eligible to apply

Title: DPIIT Junior Consultant Recruitment Notification
Summary:
- DPIIT   Recruitment 2024:  The Department for Promotion of Industry and Internal Trade (DPIIT), Government of India, is recruiting for 02 Posts of Junior Consultant in the Leather and Footwear Section
- This is a contractual role for three years with the possibility of extension based on performance
- The position requires candidates with a Masters or PhD degree in Management, Finance, Economics or related field with 3-5 years of relevant work experience

Title: WII Recruitment 2024
Summary:
- WII Recruitment 2024 : The Wildlife Institute of India (WII), Dehradun, has announced recruitment for various Group B and C staff positions for 2024-2025
- The available roles include Technical Assistants, Technicians, Junior Stenographers, and other administrative positions, with vacancies across different categories
- Eligible candidates must submit their applications by 6th January 2025 (13th January 2025 for remote region applicants)

Title: IPPB SO Recruitment 2024
Summary:
- IPPB SO Recruitment 2024 : India Post Payments Bank ( IPPB ) has announced the recruitment of Specialist Officers (SO) in IT and Cyber Security for 2024
- The recruitment includes 68 vacancies across regular and contractual positions, with roles ranging from Assistant Manager to Senior Manager in IT and Cyber Security domains
- Eligible candidates can apply online from December 21, 2024, to January 10, 2025, via the official website, ippbonline
